page.title: 04Employment
page.content: In our block there are a number of factories,a lot of offices,shops, schools and some pubs and farms all offering jobs. 25% of children's dads work in Chesham,9 people work in London, 4 of them go by train,4 by car and 1 by coach.15 other dads work in other towns within the area. 1 dad flys by plane to Luxembourg. Some people choose to work for themselves but most are employed by big firms. Some make goods. 1 of the manufacuring factories is Alcan who make tin foil. S.P.D.distribute and deliver goods. Such places as Sensonics produce electrical equipment whereas other firms do research work.Some are builders with associated trades whereas others are envolved in financial business.Many others are employed in service industries.
